steps.name: Prepare Ingredients
steps.instructions: Finely chop the onion and garlic. Gather all ingredients for quick access.

illustration.description: Chopped onions and garlic on a cutting board

steps.name: Cook Sauce
steps.instructions: In a saucepan, sauté the onions and garlic in olive oil until translucent. Add the ground beef and cook until browned. Stir in tomato sauce and simmer for 15 minutes.

illustration.description: Simmering ground beef in tomato sauce

steps.name: Boil Spaghetti
steps.instructions: Boil spaghetti in salted water according to package instructions (usually around 8–10 minutes). Drain and set aside.

illustration.description: Boiling spaghetti in a pot of water

steps.name: Combine and Serve
steps.instructions: Place the spaghetti on a plate and top with the sauce. Garnish with grated cheese or fresh basil if desired.

illustration.description: Finished spaghetti bolognese, ready to serve
